pages.text: They said, "O Moses ! we will never enter it while they are in it, so you and your Lord go and fight, we will certainly sit here
He said, "My Lord ! I do not have control except on myself and my brother, so effect separation between us and the transgressing people
He said, "So the (land) will be forbidden to them for forty years, they will wander in the earth, so do not grieve for the transgressing people

And recite to them the true story of the two sons of Adam, when they both offered an offering, but it was accepted from one of them and was not accepted from the other (who) said, "I will definitely kill you." (The other) said, "God accepts only from those who guard (against evil)
if you stretch your hand towards me to kill me I will not stretch my hand towards you to kill you, I fear God the Lord of the worlds
I intend that you should bear my sin as well as your own sin so that you should be among the inhabitants of hell and that is the reward of the unjust
So his soul willed for him, the murder of his brother, he thus killed him and thereby became one of the losers

Then God sent a crow scratching the earth to show him how to hide his brother's dead body. He said, "Sorrowful is my state, was I unable to be equal even to this crow so as to hide the dead body of my brother?" He thus became one of those who regret
